languages.text: {n}Неестественно ровная стена, испещренная странными символами, привлекла их внимание. Туннель уходил глубоко вниз и не значился на картах горных разработок. Руководство колонией повелело провести архивные изыскания, запретить работы в этом секторе и выставило охрану до установления его происхождения.{/n}

{n}An unnaturally even wall covered in strange symbols caught their attention. The tunnel went down deep and was not on any of the mining maps. The colony administration gave orders to conduct an archive survey, banned work in the sector, and had guards posted there until the origins of the tunnel could be established.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Неестественно ровная стена, испещренная странными символами, привлекла их внимание. Туннель уходил глубоко вниз и не значился на картах горных разработок. Руководство колонией повелело провести архивные изыскания, запретить работы в этом секторе и выставило охрану до установления его происхождения.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}An unnaturally even wall covered in strange symbols had caught their attention. The tunnel went deep down and was not on the mining maps. The administration of the colony had ordered to conduct an archive survey, to ban working in the sector, and had guards posted there up until establishing the origins of the tunnel.{/n}

{n}An unnaturally even wall covered in strange symbols had caught their attention. The tunnel went deep down and was not on the mining maps. The administration of the colony had ordered to conduct an archive survey, to ban working in the sector, and had guards posted there up until establishing the origins of the tunnel.{/n}

The colony administration gave orders to conduct an archive survey, banned work in the sector, and had guards posted there until the origins of the tunnel could be established.{/n}

The colony administration gave orders to conduct an archive survey, banned work in the sector, and had guards posted there until the origins of the tunnel could be established.{/n}

The colony administration gave orders to conduct an archive survey, banned work in the sector, and had guards posted there until the origins of the tunnel could be established.{/n}

{n}An unnaturally even wall covered in strange symbols caught their attention. The tunnel went down deep and was not on any of the mining maps. The colony administration gave orders to conduct an archive survey, banned work in the sector, and had guards posted there until the origins of the tunnel could be established.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一面满是古怪符号的墙引起了他们的注意。这条隧道很深，在任何一张采矿地图上都找不到。殖民地政府下令调查档案，禁止在该地区工作，并派驻警卫，直到隧道的源头被确定为止。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An unnaturally even wall covered in strange symbols caught their attention. The tunnel went down deep and was not on any of the mining maps. The colony administration gave orders to conduct an archive survey, banned work in the sector, and had guards posted there until the origins of the tunnel could be established.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一面满是古怪符号的墙引起了他们的注意。这条隧道很深，在任何一张采矿地图上都找不到。殖民地政府下令调查档案，禁止在该地区工作，并派驻警卫，直到隧道的源头被确定为止。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una pared anormalmente uniforme cubierta de extraños símbolos llamó su atención. El túnel descendía a gran profundidad y no aparecía en ninguno de los mapas mineros. La administración de la colonia dio órdenes de realizar un estudio del archivo, prohibió trabajar en el sector e hizo montar guardias hasta que se pudiera determinar el origen del túnel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An unnaturally even wall covered in strange symbols caught their attention. The tunnel went down deep and was not on any of the mining maps. The colony administration gave orders to conduct an archive survey, banned work in the sector, and had guards posted there until the origins of the tunnel could be established.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una pared anormalmente uniforme cubierta de extraños símbolos llamó su atención. El túnel descendía a gran profundidad y no aparecía en ninguno de los mapas mineros. La administración de la colonia dio órdenes de realizar un estudio del archivo, prohibió trabajar en el sector e hizo montar guardias hasta que se pudiera determinar el origen del túnel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}奇妙な記号で埋め尽くされた、不自然に均一な壁に彼らの目は引きつけられた。その坑道は奥深くまで続いていて、どの採掘地図にも載っていなかった。コロニー管理局は、坑道の起源の特定ができるまで、資料調査を実施し、そのセクターでの作業を禁止し、護衛を配置するよう命じた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An unnaturally even wall covered in strange symbols caught their attention. The tunnel went down deep and was not on any of the mining maps. The colony administration gave orders to conduct an archive survey, banned work in the sector, and had guards posted there until the origins of the tunnel could be established.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}奇妙な記号で埋め尽くされた、不自然に均一な壁に彼らの目は引きつけられた。その坑道は奥深くまで続いていて、どの採掘地図にも載っていなかった。コロニー管理局は、坑道の起源の特定ができるまで、資料調査を実施し、そのセクターでの作業を禁止し、護衛を配置するよう命じた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une paroi peu naturelle couverte de symboles étranges retient leur attention. La galerie qui s'enfonce profondément ne figure sur aucune des cartes de la mine... L'administration de la colonie donne des ordres pour étudier les archives, interdit tout travail dans ce secteur et poste des gardes jusqu'à ce que l'origine du tunnel soit découverte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An unnaturally even wall covered in strange symbols caught their attention. The tunnel went down deep and was not on any of the mining maps. The colony administration gave orders to conduct an archive survey, banned work in the sector, and had guards posted there until the origins of the tunnel could be established.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une paroi peu naturelle couverte de symboles étranges retient leur attention. La galerie qui s'enfonce profondément ne figure sur aucune des cartes de la mine... L'administration de la colonie donne des ordres pour étudier les archives, interdit tout travail dans ce secteur et poste des gardes jusqu'à ce que l'origine du tunnel soit découverte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine unnatürlich gerade Wand, die mit merkwürdigen Symbolen bedeckt war, weckte ihre Aufmerksamkeit. Der Tunnel verlief sehr tief unter die Erde und war auf keiner Karte eingezeichnet. Die Verwaltung der Kolonie erteilte den Befehl, die Archive zu durchsuchen, verbot jede Arbeit in dem betreffenden Sektor und postierte dort Wachen, bis die Herkunft der Tunnel geklärt werden konnte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An unnaturally even wall covered in strange symbols caught their attention. The tunnel went down deep and was not on any of the mining maps. The colony administration gave orders to conduct an archive survey, banned work in the sector, and had guards posted there until the origins of the tunnel could be established.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine unnatürlich gerade Wand, die mit merkwürdigen Symbolen bedeckt war, weckte ihre Aufmerksamkeit. Der Tunnel verlief sehr tief unter die Erde und war auf keiner Karte eingezeichnet. Die Verwaltung der Kolonie erteilte den Befehl, die Archive zu durchsuchen, verbot jede Arbeit in dem betreffenden Sektor und postierte dort Wachen, bis die Herkunft der Tunnel geklärt werden konnte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Karşılarına çıkan garip sembollerle kaplı ve dümdüz bir duvar dikkatlerini çekti. Tünel oldukça derine iniyor ve maden haritalarının hiçbirinde yer almıyordu. Koloni idaresi arşiv araştırması için emir vermiş, sektörde çalışılmasını yasaklamış ve tünelin kökeni teşhis edilene dek buraya muhafızlar konuşlandırmıştı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An unnaturally even wall covered in strange symbols caught their attention. The tunnel went down deep and was not on any of the mining maps. The colony administration gave orders to conduct an archive survey, banned work in the sector, and had guards posted there until the origins of the tunnel could be established.{/n}
